Title: Huddersfield
Writer: Ugljesa Sajtinac (play), Ugljesa Sajtinac (screenplay), Dejan Nikolaj Kraljacic (screenplay)
Actors: Goran Susljik, Nebojsa Glogovac, Damjan Kecojevic, Vojin Cetkovic
Plot: Story is set in a small town in Serbia. Rasha is thirty, lives with his alcoholic father and trying, and failing, to make ends meet by giving literature lessons to teenage girls and hosting...
